text:
An empty page is inserted before the table if I use break-before="page".
However, the empty page is not inserted if I wrap the table in fo:block and
apply property break-before="page" to the fo:block element.

The test file:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<fo:root xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format">

<fo:layout-master-set>
  <fo:simple-page-master master-name="simple">
    <fo:region-body/>
  </fo:simple-page-master>
</fo:layout-master-set>

<fo:page-sequence master-reference="simple">
  <fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body">
    <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="80%" break-before="page">
      <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/>
      <fo:table-body>
        <fo:table-row>
          <fo:table-cell>
            <fo:block>Text</fo:block>
          </fo:table-cell>
        </fo:table-row>
      </fo:table-body>
    </fo:table>
  </fo:flow>
</fo:page-sequence>

</fo:root>
